TEXT.Italian: Promemoria della combinazione per accedere alle Opzioni del

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a message about Alt + Ctrl + O when a game is started or loaded.
TEXT.French: En activant, en rappel sur l'utilisation de Alt + Ctrl + O est montré quand un jeu démarre ou est chargé.
TEXT.German: Zeigt nach dem Spielstart oder dem Laden eines Spielstands eine Meldung, die an die Tastenkombination [STRG + ALT + O] erinnert, mit der man die Optionen der "BUG Mod" aufrufen kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra un messaggio che ricorda la combinazione di tasti per accedere al Menù delle Opzioni del BUG Mod quando un gioco viene iniziato o caricato .
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays a message about Alt + Ctrl + O when a game is started or loaded.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Schaltfläche zum Aufruf des Optionensbildschirms der BUG Mod an
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays your gold rate in yellow if it is negative but not enough to drop your treasury below zero.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays your gold rate in yellow if it is negative but not enough to drop your treasury below zero.
TEXT.German: Färbt die Anzeige für "Gold/Runde" Gelb ein, wenn dessen Wert zwar negativ ist, den Goldvorrat in der nächsten Runde aber nicht unter 0 senken wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il tasso di crescita dell'oro in giallo se è negativo ma non abbastanza da mandarvi in rosso.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays your gold rate in yellow if it is negative but not enough to drop your treasury below zero.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the progress and city of the next Great Person.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre la barre de progrès et la ville du prochain Personnage Illustre.
TEXT.German: Zeigt einen Fortschrittsbalken an, um zu bestimmen, wann und in welcher Stadt die nächste Große Persönlichkeit erscheinen wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il progresso e la città del prossimo Grande Personaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the progress and city of the next Great Person.

TEXT.English: Determines how many GP types to display in the GP Progress Bar. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximum[COLOR_REVERT] setting also displays the percent chance for each.
TEXT.French: Determine combien de types de PI doivent être montrés dans la Barre de Progrès. L'option [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximum[COLOR_REVERT] montre aussi les chances de chacun.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Anzahl der Typen von Großen Persönlichkeiten, die im Fortschrittsbalken angezeigt werden (die Einstellung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximal[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt zusätzlich die prozentuale Chance für jede einzelne an)
TEXT.Italian: Determina quanti tipi di Grandi Personaggi devono essere mostrati nella Barra dei Grandi Personaggi. L'impostazione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Massimo[COLOR_REVERT] mostra anche la possibilità percentuale di ognuna.
TEXT.Spanish: Determines how many GP types to display in the GP Progress Bar. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximum[COLOR_REVERT] setting also displays the percent chance for each.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a progress bar for the next Great General.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre l'Expérience au Combat nécessaire pour le prochain Général Illustre.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die gesammelte Gefechtserfahrung an, um das Erscheinen des nächsten Großen Generals zu bestimmen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la barra di avanzamento per il prossimo Grande Generale.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays a progress bar for the next Great General.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a second pair of +/- buttons for each commerce type that set the rate to 100% and 0% respectively.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays a second pair of +/- buttons for each commerce type that set the rate to 100% and 0% respectively.
TEXT.German: Zeigt ein zweites Paar "+/-"-Schaltflächen für jede Art Investitionsanteil an, die diese auf 100% beziehungsweise 0% setzen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra una seconda coppia di bottoni +/- per ogni tipo di commercio che impostano il valore rispettivamente al 100% ed allo 0%.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays a second pair of +/- buttons for each commerce type that set the rate to 100% and 0% respectively.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays arrows to cycle through cities above your civ's flag.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre des flèches pour cycler vos villes au-dessous du drapeau de votre civilisation.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Pfeile über der Flagge der eigenen Zivilisation an, mit denen durch die einzelnen Städte geschaltet werden kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra sopra alla vostra bandiera le frecce per scorrere fra le Città.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays arrows to cycle through cities above your civ's flag.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a slide bar which can be used to change the field of view.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays a slide bar which can be used to change the field of view.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Hauptbildschirm einen Schieberegler an, mit dem das Sichtfeld (engl. "Field of View") eingestellt werden kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, visualizza un cursore che può essere utilizzato per regolare il campo visuale.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays a slide bar which can be used to change the field of view.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays tick marks on selected progress bars that illustrate estimated future turn progress.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays tick marks on selected progress bars that illustrate estimated future turn progress.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Teilstriche auf ausgewählten Fortschrittsbalken an, die deren voraussichtlichen Verlauf in zukünftigen Runden darstellen
TEXT.Italian: Visualizza sulle barre di avanzamento selezionate dei trattini che mostrano il progresso stimato per i turni successivi.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays tick marks on selected progress bars that illustrate estimated future turn progress.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.
TEXT.German: Merkt sich die letzte gewählte Einstellung für das Sichtfeld (engl. "Field of View") für weitere Partien
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il valore assegnato al Campo visuale viene conservato.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.

TEXT.English: Stores the Field of View value
TEXT.French: Stores the Field of View value
TEXT.German: Eingabemöglichkeit für die Einstellung des Sichtfeldes (engl. "Field of View")
TEXT.Italian: Riporta il valore assegnato al Campo visuale
TEXT.Spanish: Stores the Field of View value

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the Movement Points for a single unit as a fraction in the Info Pane.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the Movement Points for a single unit as a fraction in the Info Pane.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Bewegungspunkte einer einzelnen Einheit in der Detailanzeige mit Nachkommastellen an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra nel Pannello delle Informazioni i Punti Movimento di una Unità come un numero con una cifra decimale.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the Movement Points for a single unit as a fraction in the Info Pane.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the minimum and maximum Movement Points for all selected units in the Info Pane.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the minimum and maximum Movement Points for all selected units in the Info Pane.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die minimalen und maximalen Bewegungspunkte aller ausgewählten Einheiten in der Detailanzeige an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra nel Pannello delle Informazioni il valore minimo e quello massimo per i Punti Movimento del gruppo di Unità selezionate.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the minimum and maximum Movement Points for all selected units in the Info Pane.

TEXT.English: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.
TEXT.French: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Größe der Bau- und Befehlssymbole im Menü am unteren Bildschirmrand
TEXT.Italian: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.
TEXT.Spanish: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.

TEXT.English: Turn on or off paging out of off-focus graphics to save memory
TEXT.French: Activer la Pagination des Graphiques hors champ pour préserver de la mémoire
TEXT.German: Turn on or off paging out of off-focus graphics to save memory
TEXT.Italian: Turn on or off paging out of off-focus graphics to save memory
TEXT.Spanish: Turn on or off paging out of off-focus graphics to save memory

TEXT.English: Selects which logging messages get printed to the screen. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.
TEXT.French: Selects which logging messages get printed to the screen. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, welche Protokoll-Meldungen im Hauptbildschirm angezeigt werden (jede Stufe schließt die Meldungen der Stufe darunter mit ein)
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona quali messaggi di log vengono mostrati sullo schermo. Ogni livello comprende ovviamente tutti i messaggi dei livelli inferiori.
TEXT.Spanish: Selects which logging messages get printed to the screen. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.

TEXT.English: Selects which logging messages get printed to the PythonDbg.log file. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.
TEXT.French: Selects which logging messages get printed to the PythonDbg.log file. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, welche Protokoll-Meldungen in der Datei "PythonDbg.log" gespeichert werden (jede Stufe schließt die Meldungen der Stufe darunter mit ein)
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona quali messaggi di log vengono scritti nel file PythonDbg.log. Ogni livello comprende ovviamente tutti i messaggi dei livelli inferiori.
TEXT.Spanish: Selects which logging messages get printed to the PythonDbg.log file. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.

TEXT.English: When checked, each log file message includes the current time in HH:MM:SS format.
TEXT.French: When checked, each log file message includes the current time in HH:MM:SS format.
TEXT.German: Fügt jeder ausgegebenen Protokoll-Meldung die aktuelle Uhrzeit im Format "HH:MM:SS" hinzu
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, ogni messaggio di log include l'ora corrente (nel formato HH:MM:SS).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, each log file message includes the current time in HH:MM:SS format.

TEXT.English: When checked, BUG will look for SVN updates and/or releases each time you launch Civilization and notify you when new ones are found.
TEXT.French: When checked, BUG will look for SVN updates and/or releases each time you launch Civilization and notify you when new ones are found.
TEXT.German: Lässt die BUG Mod bei jedem Spielstart nach SVN-Updates und/oder neuen offiziellen Versionen suchen und eine Meldung ausgeben, wenn aktuellere Versionen gefunden wurden
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il BUG Mod controllerà la disponibilità di aggiornamenti SVN e/o nuove versioni ogni volta che lancerai Civ4 e ti notificherà ciò che avrà eventualmente trovato.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, BUG will look for SVN updates and/or releases each time you launch Civilization and notify you when new ones are found.

TEXT.Italian: Cartella di installazione del BUG Mod

TEXT.English: Location where BUG files are installed.
TEXT.French: Location where BUG files are installed.
TEXT.German: Verzeichnis, in dem sich die Dateien der BUG Mod befinden
TEXT.Italian: Posizione in cui sono installati i file del BUG Mod.
TEXT.Spanish: Location where BUG files are installed.

TEXT.English: Revision number of the BUG installation.
TEXT.French: Revision number of the BUG installation.
TEXT.Italian: Numero di revisione del BUG Mod installato.
TEXT.Spanish: Revision number of the BUG installation.

TEXT.German: URL des Projektarchivs der BUG Mod
TEXT.Italian: URL della directory SVN online dove si trovano i file del BUG Mod.

TEXT.English: Revision number of the BUG repository.
TEXT.French: Revision number of the BUG repository.
TEXT.German: Revisionsnummer des Projektarchivs der BUG Mod
TEXT.Italian: Numero di revisione della versione SVN disponibile online del BUG Mod.
TEXT.Spanish: Revision number of the BUG repository.

TEXT.English: When checked, the raw breakdowns for [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], and [ICON_COMMERCE] are displayed in the trade routes table.
TEXT.French: When checked, the raw breakdowns for [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], and [ICON_COMMERCE] are displayed in the trade routes table.
TEXT.German: Zeigt eine Aufschlüsselung der Erträge von [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] und [ICON_COMMERCE] im Stadt-Bildschirm über dem Handelseinkommen an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, i valori grezzi di Cibo, Produzione e Commerci) vengono mostrati nel pannello delle vie commerciali.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the raw breakdowns for [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], and [ICON_COMMERCE] are displayed in the trade routes table.

TEXT.English: Determines the Raw Yields view used when Civ is started.
TEXT.French: Determines the Raw Yields view used when Civ is started.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, welche Erträge beim Aufruf des Stadt-Bildschirms standardmäßig angezeigt werden sollen
TEXT.Italian: Determina la vista predefinita alla partenza di Civ4 per il pannello dei Prodotti Grezzi: Rotte Commerciali, Cibo, Produzione o Commercio.
TEXT.Spanish: Determines the Raw Yields view used when Civ is started.

TEXT.English: Select which tiles to count in Raw Yields when Civ is started.
TEXT.French: Select which tiles to count in Raw Yields when Civ is started.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, welche Geländefelder in die Berechnung der Roherträge einfließen sollen, wenn das Spiel gestartet wird
TEXT.Italian: Select which tiles to count in Raw Yields when Civ is started.
TEXT.Spanish: Select which tiles to count in Raw Yields when Civ is started.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the food difference generated per turn (plus or minus) and the number of turns until starvation when the food supply is shrinking.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the food difference generated per turn (plus or minus) and the number of turns until starvation when the food supply is shrinking.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die (positive oder negative) Abweichung der erwirtschafteten Nahrungserträge pro Runde an und außerdem die Anzahl der Runden, bis eine Hungersnot ausbricht und der Nahrungsvorrat zu schrumpfen beginnt
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, visualizza la differenza del cibo generato ogni turno (positiva o negativa); quando le risorse alimentari sono in riduzione, visualizza anche il numero di turni fino alla carestia.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the food difference generated per turn (plus or minus) and the number of turns until starvation when the food supply is shrinking.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the [ICON_CITIZEN] cost and [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_GOLD] overflow for whipping and/or the [ICON_GOLD] cost for buying the item being produced in the Production Bar.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the [ICON_CITIZEN] cost and [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_GOLD] overflow for whipping and/or the [ICON_GOLD] cost for buying the item being produced in the Production Bar.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Produktionsbalken die Anzahl der [ICON_CITIZEN], die für eine Beschleunigung der Produktion geopfert werden müssen, und den daraus entstehenden Überschuss ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und/oder [ICON_GOLD]) sowie die Kosten an, die anfallen, wenn das derzeitige Bauprojekt mit [ICON_GOLD] beschleunigt werden kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la Barra della Pruduzione della Schermata Cittadina mostra il costo in popolazione ed il surplus di produzione per l'accelerazione di produzione mediante sacrifici e il costo in oro per l'accelerazione di produzione mediante pagamenti relativi all'oggetto attualmente costruito.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the [ICON_CITIZEN] cost and [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_GOLD] overflow for whipping and/or the [ICON_GOLD] cost for buying the item being produced in the Production Bar.

TEXT.English: When checked, whip production overflow estimates will include the city's current [ICON_PRODUCTION].
TEXT.French: When checked, whip production overflow estimates will include the city's current [ICON_PRODUCTION].
TEXT.German: Bezieht [ICON_PRODUCTION] einer Stadt aus der aktuellen Runde in die Berechnung des Produktionsüberschusses ein
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la stima del surplus di produzione include la produzione corrente della Città.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, whip production overflow estimates will include the city's current [ICON_PRODUCTION].

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city's borders expand.
TEXT.French: En activant, le nombre de tours nécessaire à l'expansion des frontières culturelles est montré.
TEXT.German: Zeigt in der Kulturanzeige die Anzahl der Runden an, bis sich die Kulturgrenzen einer Stadt erweitern
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il numero di turni mancanti alla successiva espansione culturale.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city's borders expand.

TEXT.Italian: Turni per la nascita di un Grande Personaggio

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city will produce a [ICON_GREATPEOPLE].
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city will produce a [ICON_GREATPEOPLE].
TEXT.German: Zeigt in der Anzeige der Große Persönlichkeit-Punkte die Anzahl der Runden an, bis eine Stadt eine Große Persönlichkeit ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) hervorbringt
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il numero di turni mancanti alla successiva nascita di un Grande Personaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city will produce a [ICON_GREATPEOPLE].

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the percentage chance and type of each possible [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] on the bar. The number shown is controlled by the General setting.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the percentage chance and type of each possible [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] on the bar. The number shown is controlled by the General setting.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Wahrscheinlichkeit des Erscheinens der verschiedenen Arten von Großen Persönlichkeiten ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzate informazioni aggiuntive sui Grandi Personaggi.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the percentage chance and type of each possible [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] on the bar. The number shown is controlled by the General setting.

TEXT.English: When checked, puts anger countdown on city screen.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre un compteur de colère sur l'écran de ville.
TEXT.German: Zeigt einen Rundenzähler im Stadt-Bildschirm an, der die Anzahl der Runden angibt, bis die Unzufriedenheit wegen einer Beschleunigung der Produktion durch Zwangsarbeit verflogen ist
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nella Schermata Cittadina viene visualizzato un contatore dei turni di Infelicità da sacrifici.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, puts anger countdown on city screen.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays only the religions that are present in the city and allows for more than seven religions.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays only the religions that are present in the city and allows for more than seven religions.
TEXT.German: Zeigt nur die in einer Stadt vorhandenen Religionen an und erlaubt die Darstellung von mehr als sieben Religionen
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays only the religions that are present in the city and allows for more than seven religions.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays only the religions that are present in the city and allows for more than seven religions.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays only the corporations that are present in the city and allows for more than seven corporations.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays only the corporations that are present in the city and allows for more than seven corporations.
TEXT.German: Zeigt nur die in einer Stadt vorhandenen Kapitalgesellschaften an und erlaubt die Darstellung von mehr als sieben Kapitalgesellschaften
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays only the corporations that are present in the city and allows for more than seven corporations.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays only the corporations that are present in the city and allows for more than seven corporations.

TEXT.English: Determines how specialists are displayed:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Default[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists using the vanilla BtS format.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stacker[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists stacked using the Stacked Specialist mod.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chevron[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists grouped into 5 (single chevron), 10 (capped chevron) and 20 (boxed capped chevron) format.
TEXT.French: Determine comment les spécialistes sont montrés.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Défaut[COLOR_REVERT] - Montre les spécialistes comme BtS.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tas[COLOR_REVERT] - Tasse les spécialistes.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chevrons[COLOR_REVERT] - Groupe les spécialistes par 5 (simple chevron), 10 (chevron plein) et 20 (chevron plein plus carré).
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Anordnung der Spezialisten im Stadt-Bildschirm:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard[COLOR_REVERT] - Spezialisten werden wie in "Beyond the Sword" angeordnet[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stapel[COLOR_REVERT] - Spezialisten werden gestapelt angeordnet (verwendet die "Stacked Specialist"-Mod)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chevron[COLOR_REVERT] - Spezialisten werden zu Gruppen aus 5 (einfaches Chevron), 10 (geschlossenes Chevron) und 20 (eingerahmtes geschlossenes Chevron) Spezialisten zusammengefasst
TEXT.Italian: Determina quanti Specialisti vengono mostrati:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Predefinito[COLOR_REVERT] - mostra gli Specialisti utilizzando il formato standard di Civ4:BtS;[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Impilati[COLOR_REVERT] - mostra gli Specialisti utilizzando il formato a pile dello 'Stacked Specialist Mod';[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Galloni[COLOR_REVERT] - mostra gli Specialisti raggruppati per 5, 10 e 20 utilizzando il formato a galloni dello 'Chevron Mod'.
TEXT.Spanish: Determines how specialists are displayed:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Default[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists using the vanilla BtS format.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stacker[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists stacked using the Stacked Specialist mod.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chevron[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists grouped into 5 (single chevron), 10 (capped chevron) and 20 (boxed capped chevron) format.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the remaining turns in cyan for items that have been started.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the remaining turns in cyan for items that have been started.
TEXT.German: Färbt die bis zur Fertigstellung eines Projekts verbleibenden Runden Blau ein
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the remaining turns in cyan for items that have been started.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the remaining turns in cyan for items that have been started.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a yellow exclamation point (!) next to items in the build queue that are close to decaying from being left in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for too long. Two red exclamation points signify that the item will decay this turn if it is not first in the queue.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays a yellow exclamation point (!) next to items in the build queue that are close to decaying from being left in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for too long. Two red exclamation points signify that the item will decay this turn if it is not first in the queue.
TEXT.German: Zeigt ein gelbes Ausrufezeichen (!) bei Projekten in der Produktionsliste an, deren Produktionsfortschritt demnächst verfällt, da sie zu lange in der Liste stehen, ohne dass weitere [ICON_PRODUCTION] auf sie verwendet wurden. Zwei rote Ausrufezeichen (!!) zeigen an, dass der Produktionsfortschritt eines Projekts in dieser Runde verfällt, falls es nicht weiter produziert wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra un punto esclamativo (!) giallo per gli oggetti nella coda di produzione che sono prossimi a perdere la produzione accumulata a causa della eccessiva permanenza nella coda senza ulteriore aggiunta di [ICON_PRODUCTION]. Due punti esclamativi rossi indicano che l'oggetto nella coda perderà la produzione accumulata nel turno in corso a meno che non venga posizionato in testa alla coda produttiva.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays a yellow exclamation point (!) next to items in the build queue that are close to decaying from being left in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for too long. Two red exclamation points signify that the item will decay this turn if it is not first in the queue.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Units decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 10 turns.
TEXT.French: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Units decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 10 turns.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Anzahl der Runden, bevor der Produktionsfortschritt einer produzierten Einheit verfällt und ein gelbes Ausrufezeichen angezeigt wird (Produktionsfortschritte bei Einheiten verfallen, wenn sie 10 Runden in der Liste stehen, ohne dass weitere [ICON_PRODUCTION] auf sie verwendet wurden)
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il numero di turni prima che una Unità in coda perda la produzione accumulata mancanti i quali verrà visualizzato il punto esclamativo giallo di avvertimento. Le Unità perdono la produzione accumulata dopo essere state nella coda di produzione per 10 turni senza aggiunte di [ICON_PRODUCTION].
TEXT.Spanish: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Units decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 10 turns.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Buildings decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 50 turns. Projects never decay.
TEXT.French: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Buildings decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 50 turns. Projects never decay.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Anzahl der Runden, bevor der Produktionsfortschritt eines produzierten Gebäudes verfällt und ein gelbes Ausrufezeichen angezeigt wird (Produktionsfortschritte bei Gebäuden verfallen, wenn sie 50 Runden in der Liste stehen, ohne dass weitere [ICON_PRODUCTION] auf sie verwendet wurden; bei Projekten geschieht dies nie)
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il numero di turni prima che un Edificio in coda perda la produzione accumulata mancanti i quali verrà visualizzato il punto esclamativo giallo di avvertimento. Gli Edifici perdono la produzione accumulata dopo essere state nella coda di produzione per 50 turni senza aggiunte di [ICON_PRODUCTION]; i Progetti invece non perdono mai la produzione accumulata.
TEXT.Spanish: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Buildings decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 50 turns. Projects never decay.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of turns before and amount of decay in the hover text for units and buildings in the build queue.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the number of turns before and amount of decay in the hover text for units and buildings in the build queue.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip von Einheiten und Gebäuden in der Produktionsliste die Anzahl der Runden an, bis ein Produktionsfortschritt verfällt und wie viele [ICON_PRODUCTION] dann verloren gehen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra nel testo a comparsa delle Unità e degli Edifici in coda di produzione il numero di turni prima che perdano la produzione accumulata e l'ammontare di tale perdita.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the number of turns before and amount of decay in the hover text for units and buildings in the build queue.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.
TEXT.French: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Anzahl der Runden, bevor der Produktionsfortschritt einer produzierten Einheit verfällt und ein gelbes Ausrufezeichen angezeigt wird
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il numero di turni prima che una Unità in coda perda la produzione accumulata mancanti i quali verranno visualizzate per la prima volta le informazioni relative.
TEXT.Spanish: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.
TEXT.French: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Anzahl der Runden, bevor der Produktionsfortschritt eines produzierten Gebäudes verfällt und ein gelbes Ausrufezeichen angezeigt wird
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il numero di turni prima che un Edificio in coda perda la produzione accumulata mancanti i quali verranno visualizzate per la prima volta le informazioni relative.
TEXT.Spanish: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.

TEXT.English: When checked, selecting a civilian unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.French: When checked, selecting a civilian unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.German: Lässt eine Stadt wiederholt eine zivile Einheit produzieren, die im Stadt-Baumenü ausgewählt wurde
TEXT.Italian: When checked, selecting a civilian unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, selecting a civilian unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.

TEXT.English: When checked, selecting a military unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.French: When checked, selecting a military unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.German: Lässt eine Stadt wiederholt eine militärische Einheit produzieren, die im Stadt-Baumenü ausgewählt wurde
TEXT.Italian: When checked, selecting a military unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, selecting a military unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses the BUG Finance Advisor (requires restart).
TEXT.French: When checked, uses the BUG Finance Advisor (requires restart).
TEXT.German: Aktiviert den verbesserten Finanzberater der BUG Mod (erfordert Neustart)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, visualizza il Consigliere Economico del BUG mod (è richiesto un perchè il cambiamento abbia effetto).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, uses the BUG Finance Advisor (requires restart).

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the 'Glance' tab on the Exotic Foreign Advisor screen.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre la page 'Coup d'Oeuil' sur la page de l'Adviseur Etranger Exotique.
TEXT.German: Zeigt einen zusätzlichen Kurzüberblick im Bildschirm des Auslandsberaters an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, visualizza la tabella "Occhiata" nella schermata del Consigliere Estero (utilizzando l'Exotic Foreign Advisor Mod).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the 'Glance' tab on the Exotic Foreign Advisor screen.

TEXT.English: Select how to display AI attitudes on the GLANCE tab: numbers, smilies, or both.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez le mode d'afficher des attitudes d'AI sur l'onglet GLANCE: nombres, des smileys, ou les deux.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wie im Kurzüberblick die Einstellung anderer Zivilisationen gegenüber der eigenen dargestellt werden
TEXT.Italian: Selezionare la modalità di visualizzazione atteggiamenti AI sulla scheda GLANCE: i numeri, faccine, o entrambi.
TEXT.Spanish: Select how to display AI attitudes on the GLANCE tab: numbers, smilies, or both.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses improved Foreign Advisor 'Info' tab instead of default.
TEXT.French: When checked, uses improved Foreign Advisor 'Info' tab instead of default.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Informationen auf der entsprechenden Seite des Auslandsberaters übersichtlicher an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, utilizza la versione migliorata della scheda Informazioni del Consigliere Estero al posto di quella standard.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, uses improved Foreign Advisor 'Info' tab instead of default.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows how many turns are left before you can cancel each deal on the 'Active' tab.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows how many turns are left before you can cancel each deal on the 'Active' tab.
TEXT.German: Zeigt an, wie viele Runden noch verbleiben, bis ein Vertrag im Auslandsberater unter "Aktiv" gekündigt werden kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra quanti turni sono rimasti prima che si possa annullare un accordo.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows how many turns are left before you can cancel each deal on the 'Active' tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses the BUG Militiary Advisor (requires restart).
TEXT.French: When checked, uses the BUG Militiary Advisor (requires restart).
TEXT.German: Aktiviert den verbesserten Militärberater der BUG Mod (erfordert Neustart)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, utilizza il Consigliere Militare del BUG Mod (è richiesto un perchè il cambiamento abbia effetto).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, uses the BUG Militiary Advisor (requires restart).

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the technology each type of great person will research.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre la technologie que chaque Personnage Illustre peut découvrir.
TEXT.German: Zeigt links neben dem Technologiebaum die Technologien an, die jeder Typ einer Großen Persönlichkeit erforschen kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, visualizza la tecnologia ricercata da ogni Grande Personaggio nella schermata del Consigliere Tecnologico.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the technology each type of great person will research.

TEXT.English: When checked, the width of the tech screen will be linked to your screen resolution (requires restart).
TEXT.French: En activant, la largeur de l'écran de technologie dépendra de votre résolution d'écran (requièrt un redémarrage).
TEXT.German: Koppelt die Breite des Technologiebaums an die Bildschirmauflösung (erfordert Neustart)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la larghezza della schermata del Consigliere Tecnologico è legata alla risoluzione dello schermo (è richiesto un riavvio perchè il cambiamento abbia effetto).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the width of the tech screen will be linked to your screen resolution (requires restart).

TEXT.English: When selected, shows the technology's associated era.
TEXT.French: When selected, shows the technology's associated era.
TEXT.German: Zeigt jeweils die Epoche an, zu der eine Technologie gehört
TEXT.Italian: When selected, shows the technology's associated era.
TEXT.Spanish: When selected, shows the technology's associated era.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays extra information on the Religious tab.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays extra information on the Religious tab.
TEXT.German: Zeigt zusätzliche Informationen auf der entsprechenden Seite des Religionsberaters an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra informazioni aggiuntive nella schermata del Consigliere Religioso.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays extra information on the Religious tab.

TEXT.English: Select which religions should be shown in the top area of the Religion Advisor.
TEXT.French: Select which religions should be shown in the top area of the Religion Advisor.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, welche Religionen in der oberen Hälfte des Religionsberaters angezeigt werden sollen
TEXT.Italian: Select which religions should be shown in the top area of the Religion Advisor.
TEXT.Spanish: Select which religions should be shown in the top area of the Religion Advisor.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays extra information on the Victories tab.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays extra information on the Victories tab.
TEXT.German: Zeigt zusätzliche Informationen auf der entsprechenden Seite des Sieg-Bildschirms an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra informazioni aggiuntive nella Scheda delle Vittorie della Schermata Condizioni di Vittoria.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays extra information on the Victories tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays extra information on the Members tab.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays extra information on the Members tab.
TEXT.German: Zeigt zusätzliche Informationen auf der entsprechenden Seite des Sieg-Bildschirms an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra informazioni aggiuntive nella Scheda dei Membri della Schermata Condizioni di Vittoria.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays extra information on the Members tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays graphs in BUG format.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays graphs in BUG format.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Diagramme auf der entsprechenden Seite des Info-Bildschirms in einer übersichtlicheren Anordnung an.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la Scheda dei Grafici nel formato modificato del BUG Mod.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays graphs in BUG format.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays graphs are displayed in Log(10) scale.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays graphs are displayed in Log(10) scale.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Diagramme in einer logarithmischen Darstellung an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra i Grafici in scala logaritmica (su base 10).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays graphs are displayed in Log(10) scale.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the BUG version of the Wonders tab.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the BUG version of the Wonders tab.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die entsprechende Seite des Info-Bildschirms in einer übersichtlicheren Anordnung an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la Scheda delle Meraviglie nel formato modificato del BUG Mod.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the BUG version of the Wonders tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays wonders on the BUG version of the Wonders tab using the owning player's color.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays wonders on the BUG version of the Wonders tab using the owning player's color.
TEXT.German: Färbt die Wundernamen auf der von BUG veränderten Wunder-Seite in der Farbe des jeweiligen Spielers ein
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays wonders on the BUG version of the Wonders tab using the owning player's color.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays wonders on the BUG version of the Wonders tab using the owning player's color.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays improvements on Stats tab.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays improvements on Stats tab.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Statistiken auf der entsprechenden Seite des Info-Bildschirms in einer übersichtlicheren Anordnung an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la Scheda delle Statistiche nella versione migliorata del BUG Mod
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays improvements on Stats tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses the Sevopedia (requires restart).
TEXT.French: En activant, utilise le Sevopedia (requièrt un redémarrage).
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene utilizzata la Sevopedia invece della Civilopedia (è richiesto un riavvio perchè il cambiamento abbia effetto).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, uses the Sevopedia (requires restart).

TEXT.English: When checked, the lists of units, buildings, technologies, etc. are sorted.
TEXT.French: En activant, les listes des unités, bâtiments, technologies, etc. seront triées.
TEXT.German: Sortiert die Listen der Einheiten, Gebäuden, Technologien etc.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, le liste di Unità, Edifici, Tecnologie ecc. sono ordinate.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the lists of units, buildings, technologies, etc. are sorted.

TEXT.English: Opens the BUG Mod help file. You can hit [ALT + CTRL + F1] from the main interface.
TEXT.French: Ouvre le fichier d'aide du BUG Mod. Vous pouvez aussi utiliser [ALT + CTRL + F1] dans l'écran principal du jeu.
TEXT.German: Öffnet die Hilfe-Datei der BUG Mod (Tastenkombination [STRG + ALT + F1] im Hauptbildschirm)
TEXT.Italian: Apre il file della Guida del BUG Mod. Puoi utilizzare la scorciatoia [ALT + CTRL + F1] dall'interfaccia principale.
TEXT.Spanish: Opens the BUG Mod help file. You can hit [ALT + CTRL + F1] from the main interface.

TEXT.French: Sortir de l'écran d'options du BUG.
TEXT.German: Den Optionensbildschirm der BUG Mod verlassen
TEXT.Italian: Esci dalla schermata delle Opzioni del BUG Mod.

TEXT.German: Ruft den Optionsbildschirm der BUG Mod auf

TEXT.Italian: Il file 'BUG Mod.ini' non è stato trovato
File per la Denominazione avanzata delle Unità:

TEXT.French: Poussez sur [BOLD]ALT + CTRL + O[\BOLD] pour configurer %s1
Poussez sur [BOLD]ALT + CMD + O[\BOLD] pour configurer %s1

TEXT.English: Opening the BUG Mod help file...
TEXT.French: Ouverture du fichier d'aide du BUG Mod...
TEXT.German: Öffnen der Hilfe-Datei der BUG Mod...
TEXT.Italian: Apertura della Guida del BUG Mod in corso...
TEXT.Spanish: Opening the BUG Mod help file...

TEXT.Italian: Guida del BUG Mod non trovata

TEXT.English: Could not find the file "%s1" in the search paths. See the System tab on the BUG Options screen [ALT + CTRL + O] for details.
TEXT.French: Impossible de trouver le fichier "%s1" dans les chemins recherchés. Voir l'onglet System dans l'écran d'options du BUG Mod [ALT + CTRL + O] pour les détails.
TEXT.German: Die Datei "%s1" konnte innerhalb der erkannten Pfade nicht gefunden werden. Details finden Sie im Reiter "System" im Optionsbildschirm der BuG Mod (Tastenkombination [STRG + ALT + O]).
TEXT.Italian: Impossibile trovare il file "%s1" nei percorsi di ricerca. Vedi la tabella 'System' nella Schermata di Opzioni del BUG Mod [ALT + CTRL + O] per maggiori dettagli.
TEXT.Spanish: Could not find the file "%s1" in the search paths. See the System tab on the BUG Options screen [ALT + CTRL + O] for details.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Trade Routes[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays the Trade Routes for this city.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Trade Routes[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays the Trade Routes for this city.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotte Commericali[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza le Rotte Commericali pr questa Città.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Trade Routes[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays the Trade Routes for this city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Food[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_FOOD] sources.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Food[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_FOOD] sources.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fonti di Cibo[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza un riassunto di tutte le fonti di [ICON_FOOD].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Food[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_FOOD] sources.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Production[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_PRODUCTION] sources and modifiers.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Production[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_PRODUCTION] sources and modifiers.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fonti di Produzione[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza un riassunto di tutte le fonti di [ICON_PRODUCTION] ed i modificatori relativi.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Production[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_PRODUCTION] sources and modifiers.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Commerce[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_COMMERCE] sources and modifiers.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Commerce[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_COMMERCE] sources and modifiers.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fonti di Commercio[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza un riassunto di tutte le fonti di [ICON_COMMERCE] ed i modificatori relativi.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Commerce[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_COMMERCE] sources and modifiers.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Worked Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city is currently working.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Worked Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city is currently working.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nur bearbeitete Geländefelder[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Zur Berechnung der Roherträge werden alle Geländefelder, die von der Stadt derzeit bearbeitet werden, herangezogen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caselle lavorate[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Considera solo le caselle della Città attualmente lavorate.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Worked Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city is currently working.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count City's Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city controls.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count City's Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city controls.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nur Stadtgeländefelder[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Zur Berechnung der Roherträge werden alle Geländefelder, die von der Stadt derzeit kontrolliert werden, herangezogen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caselle della Città[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Considera le caselle attualmente controllate dalla Città.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count City's Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city controls.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Owned Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles in the city radius owned by your civilization.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Owned Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles in the city radius owned by your civilization.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nur Geländefelder in Besitz[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Zur Berechnung der Roherträge werden alle Geländefelder, die sich im Einzugsgebiet der Stadt befinden und zur eigenen Zivilisation gehören, herangezogen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caselle possedute[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Considera le caselle nel raggio cittadino attualmente possedute dalla Civiltà.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Owned Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles in the city radius owned by your civilization.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count All Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts all tiles in the city radius regardless of owner.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count All Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts all tiles in the city radius regardless of owner.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alle Geländefelder[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Zur Berechnung der Roherträge werden alle Geländefelder, die sich im Einzugsgebiet der Stadt befinden, unabhängig davon, welcher Zivilisation sie gehören, herangezogen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tutte le caselle[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Considera tutte le caselle nel raggio cittadino indipendentemente dal proprietario.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count All Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts all tiles in the city radius regardless of owner.

TEXT.English: Enter the number of turns until the reminder goes off and the message to display.
TEXT.French: Entrez le nombre de tours jusqu'à l'apparition du rappel et le message à montrer.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie die Anzahl der Runden an, bis die Erinnerung angezeigt werden soll.
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il numero di turni che devono passare prima che il promemoria scada ed il messaggio venga visualizzato.
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the number of turns until the reminder goes off and the message to display.

TEXT.English: Show reminder again at the end of this turn?
TEXT.French: Remontrer le rappel à la fin de ce tour?
TEXT.German: Erinnerung am Ende dieser Runde erneut anzeigen?
TEXT.Italian: Mostrare nuovamente il promemoria alla fine del turno?
TEXT.Spanish: Show reminder again at the end of this turn?

TEXT.French: Remontrer le rappel au prochain tour?
TEXT.Italian: Mostrare nuovamente il promemoria il prossimo turno?

TEXT.English: Zoom in and out by clicking on the body of the chart
TEXT.French: Zoom in and out by clicking on the body of the chart
TEXT.German: Mit einem Mausklick auf ein Diagramm kann zwischen der verkleinerten Ansicht und der Großansicht umgeschalten werden
TEXT.Italian: Alterna i livelli di zoom cliccando sul grafico
TEXT.Spanish: Zoom in and out by clicking on the body of the chart

TEXT.English: Source: Recent BUG Poll, statistical margin of error %s1.
TEXT.French: Source: Sondage BUG récents, marge d'erreur %s1.
TEXT.Italian: Fonte: recente sondaggio BUG, margine di errore statistico %s1.
TEXT.Spanish: Fuente: Encuesta BUG recientes, margen estadístico de error %s1.
